post:
KICK OFF 2013 WITH A GREAT DEAL FROM TURNKEY INTERNET!

2013 is an exciting new year, and we’re celebrating with exciting savings on our virtual private servers! With coupon code TK2013, save 20% on your next order, and start 2013 the right way. This deal is for a limited time only, so act fast!

All VPS's include the following:
  • Xen - No over-selling, all guaranteed resources!
  • Linux or Windows (and custom OS's such as VMWare, Solaris, and more!)
  • 50+ Pre-ready Linux images to choose from
  • 50+ CD-ROM ISO CD discs to install custom operating systems
  • Guaranteed RAM - No burst, no over-sold servers, fully-allocated RAM!
  • RAID-10 ultra-fast disk systems (SSD, SATA 6GBPS, & SAS 15K RPM technology)
  • Tier-1 national backbone connections via BGP4 redundant Juniper powered core network
  • TurnKey VPS administration panel access (web-based)
  • Automated reboots
  • Automated OS reloads
  • KVM/console access to all VPS's included free!
  • Licensed installed VPS image versions of Windows Server 2012 and 2008 available
  • Bring your own license versions for Server 2012 and 2008, and Windows XP, Windows 7, and Windows 8
  • Control panels available: cPanel, Plesk, DirectAdmin, & Webmin
  • 1 IP address included
  • Free SmarterTools bundle, an $800 value with Windows VPS packages
  • 100% network uptime guarantee
  • 24x7 toll-free phone, live chat, and help desk support
  • 30-day money-back guarantee
  • NO term contract (month to month)
  • NO setup fees
  • 3 months free for 12 month pre-pay
  • 1 month free for 6 month pre-pay

FREE iPhone app included! Manage your VPS on the go. Reboot, monitor usage, bandwidth, RAM, and more – securely, from the palm of your hand, anywhere in the world!

Limit 1 coupon discount per order, this offer may not be combined with any other promotion, offer, or discount. Additional costs for certain control panels, features, or operating systems may apply. Discount pricing requires coupon use, and is reflected in the base price indicated.


All servers are hosted in our greenNew York data center. On-site solar power generation, cold containment pods, and smart aisle cooling technology make it the most energy-efficient data center of its size, anywhere!

Since 1999, TurnKey Internet has built a reputation of outstanding personalized service, reliability, and value. TurnKey is dedicated to success every step of the way. TurnKey maintains an A+ rating from the Better Business Bureau, and is the winner of the 2012 Excellence in Small Business Award from the U.S. Small Business Administration. We are experts in the cloud hosting and data center space, and are here to support you for any and all of your hosting needs.

Don't just take our word for it - view these Verified Client Testimonials and our 5-star, perfect rating from Shopper Approved.

Transfer Special: Transfer from a competitor by the end of this month and receive a $50.00 service credit.


TurnKey VPS offers Xen-powered virtual server technology, backed by our very own New Yorkgreen data center, equipment, and US-based support team.
